title: Update: Is His Fiancée's List Of Rules For His Bachelor Party Unreasonable?
description:
He's stressing out about his upcoming bachelor's party for several reasons. It all has to do with his fiancée's list of rules. From the start of the trip to the end, she has given him a list of demands that may suck the fun out of the trip.
He refuses to abide by her rules, so what does he do? Cancel the trip or still go on the trip without telling her?
